data.title: Should the Western movies that show native Indians as savages be removed from viewing?
data.meta_description:
Answer: That would be pointless, as only a handful of old movie buffs ever watch them.

Hollywood stopped making those movies a half-century ago. Most of the few modern American movies about that period are based on Italian â€œSpaghetti Westerns. They are primarily concerned with sociopaths and thu...
